channel.title: CVE Feed for ultravnc -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ultravnc -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-15361|2024-09-16T17:07:56.107Z -- ultravnc -- ultravnc
item.description: UltraVNC revision 1198 has a buffer underflow vulnerability in VNC client code, which can potentially result in code execution. This attack appears to be exploitable via network connectivity. This vulnerability has been fixed in revision 1199.

item.title: CVE-2019-8262|2024-09-16T16:49:03.600Z -- ultravnc -- ultravnc
item.description: UltraVNC revision 1203 has multiple heap buffer overflow vulnerabilities in VNC client code inside Ultra decoder, which results in code execution. This attack appears to be exploitable via network connectivity. These vulnerabilities have been fixed in revision 1204.

item.title: CVE-2019-8258|2024-09-16T19:15:25.845Z -- ultravnc -- ultravnc
item.description: UltraVNC revision 1198 has a heap buffer overflow vulnerability in VNC client code which results code execution. This attack appears to be exploitable via network connectivity. This vulnerability has been fixed in revision 1199.
